regex: wrong account name or password
message_cn: 登陆帐号/密码出错
message_en: wrong account name or password

regex: The session is invalid, either wrong session id or the session has been expired
message_cn: session过期，或者提供了不正确的session id
message_en: The session is invalid, either wrong session id or the session has been expired

regex: .*unable to create an account. An account already called .*
message_cn: 无法创建帐户。一个名为%1$s的帐户已存在
message_en: unable to create an account. An account already existed.

regex: .*unable to update name. An account already called .*
message_cn: 无法修改帐户名称。一个名为%1$s的帐户已存在
message_en: unable to update name. An account already existed.

regex: this user is locked, remaining time: .* seconds.*
message_cn: 该用户已被锁定，请 %1$s 秒后在重试
message_en: this user is locked, remaining time: %1$s seconds.

regex: the SSH port is not open after.*Failed to login the vyos router.*
message_cn: 启动虚拟路由器超时,经过 %1$s 秒等待，虚拟路由器的SSH端口仍未开放。
message_en: Start virtual router timeout, the SSH port of the virtual router is not open after %1$s seconds

regex: .*certificate has expired or is not yet valid
message_cn: 当前系统时间不在镜像仓库证书有效期内, 调整过镜像仓库服务器的系统时间，或者证书被修改
message_en: current System time has expired for imagestore certification, imagestore server system time or certification might be modified

regex: duplicate backup storage. There has been an image store backup storage.*
message_cn: 重复的镜像仓库ip地址，该地址己经被镜像服务器[%1$s]占用。
message_en: Duplicate backup storage. This ip address had been occupied by image store backup server[%1$s].

regex: .*Failed to download image\[name:.*] on all backup storage.*
message_cn: 在备份存储上下载镜像失败。
message_en: Failed to download image on any backup storage[%2$s].

regex: .*More than one BackupStorage on the same host identified by hostname. There has been a SftpBackupStorage \[hostname:.*] existing. The BackupStorage type to be added is ImageStoreBackupStorage.*
message_cn: 同一IP只能添加成为一个镜像服务器。目前已经存在一个Sftp类型镜像服务器
message_en: More than one BackupStorage on the same host identified by hostname. There has been a SftpBackupStorage existing

regex: System can't find imagestore backup Storage. Please do not set imagestore backup Storage server IP to localhost(127.*.*.*),.*
message_cn: 无法找到ImageStore镜像服务器，请勿将镜像服务器的地址设置为localhost(127.*.*.*)。
message_en: Cannot find imagestore backup storage, try avoid to use the localhost(127.*.*.*) as the ip of the imagestore backup storage server.

regex: failed to download bits from the imagestore backup storage\[hostname:.*, path:.*] to the local primary storage\[uuid:.*, path:.*].*
message_cn: 无法从ImageStore镜像服务器[主机名：%2$s，路径：%3$s]下载资源到本地主存储[uuid：%4$s，路径：%5$s]
message_en: Failed to download bits from the imagestore backup storage[hostname: %2$s, path: %3$s] to the local primary storage[uuid: %4$s, path: %5$s].

regex: .*, because:can not find lv .* after create, lvcreate return: .*, , WARNING: Not using lvmetad because config setting use_lvmetad=0.*
message_cn: 在存储上创建云盘后找不到逻辑卷, WARNING: using lvmetad because config setting use_lvmetad=0
message_en: Failed to find lv after create volume, WARNING: using lvmetad because config setting use_lvmetad=0

regex: .*, because:.*\[ .*.go:.* importLocalImage:failed to get image info at importLocalImage.*
message_cn: 镜像仓库从本地获取镜像信息失败
message_en: ImageStore failed to get image info at local image

regex: .*, because:cannot find pool\[.*] in the ceph cluster, you must create it manually
message_cn: 未能在ceph集群中找到存储池[%1$s],您需要先手动创建
message_en: Cann't find pool[%1$s] in the ceph cluster, you need to create it manually

regex: .*Quota exceeded.*
message_cn: 超出镜像仓库的容量限制
message_en: Out of imagestore capacity limit

regex: .*disk quota exceeded.*
message_cn: 超出容量限制
message_en: disk quota exceeded

regex: .*cannot add ceph primary storage, there has been some ceph primary storage using mon\[hostnames:.*].*
message_cn: 无法添加Ceph主存储，监控节点[%1$s]已被占用。
message_en: Cannot add ceph primary storage, there has been some ceph primary storage using mon[%1$s]

regex: cannot find any Connected ceph mon for the primary storage.*
message_cn: 无法为Ceph主存储找到一个已连接的监控节点。
message_en: Cannot find any connected Ceph monitor for the primary storage.

regex: operation error, because:The ceph storage type to be added does not support auto initialize pool, please create it manually
message_cn: 要添加的ceph存储类型不支持自动创建存储池，请手动创建。
message_en: The ceph storage type to be added does not support auto initialize pool, please create it manually.

regex: there is another CEPH primary storage.* with the same FSID.*, you cannot add the same CEPH setup as two different primary storage
message_cn: 已经存在一个FSID为[%3$s]的Ceph主存储，您不能将同一个Ceph集群设置为两个不同的主存储。
message_en: There has been another Ceph primary storage with the same FSID[%3$s], you cannot add the same Ceph cluster as two different primary storage.

regex: .*rbd: error opening image .* snap .* Connection timed out.*
message_cn: rbd：打开镜像或快照失败，连接超时。
message_en: rbd: failed to open image or snapshot, connection timed out.

regex: Fn::Join must be array and contain 2 params, .*
message_cn: Fn::Join后面的参数出错，该参数应包含2个参数，第一个为String,第二个为数组
message_en: Fn::Join must be array and contain 2 params, array[0] must be String, array[1] must be array!

regex: Param .* has no value or default value found!
message_cn: Parameter中的[%1$s]字段没有输入，并且也没有缺省值
message_en: Parameter [%1$s] has no value or default value found!

regex: .*GlobalConfig.*is of type.*, the value\[.*] cannot be converted to that type.*
message_cn: 输入值无法被转换为该全局变量所期望的类型。
message_en: The input value cannot be converted to expected type for this Global Config.

regex: unable to attach the L3 network.*L3 network is providing EIP.*
message_cn: 无法为云主机[名称：%4$s，uuid：%3$s]分配指定的IP地址，因为该地址已经被用于为一个网络接口控制设备提供EIP服务。
message_en: Unable to assign the specific ip address to VM[name:%4$s, uuid:%3$s], because this IP address is occupied by a NIC for EIP service.

regex: %s is not existed or is empty folder
message_cn: 不存在的文件: %1$s, 或文件夹为空
message_en: %1$s is not existed or is empty folder

regex: read error elaboration template files [%s] failed, due to: %s
message_cn: 无法读取错误码文件: %1$s
message_en: read error elaboration template files [%1$s] failed

regex: input args 'regex' or 'category' must be set
message_cn: 输入参数中'regex'或'category'必须设置
message_en: input args 'regex' or 'category' must be set

regex: %s is not a Long value Number
message_cn: 输入参数中'%1$s'不是有效的Long字段
message_en: %1$s is not a Long value Number

regex: arg 'startTime' should format like 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss' or '1545380003000'
message_cn: 输入参数中'startTime'的格式应该类似'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss' 或者 '1545380003000'
message_en: arg 'startTime' should format like 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss' or '1545380003000'

regex: elaboration code must be number!
message_cn: 错误码必须是个数字
message_en: elaboration code must be number

regex: No service deals with message: .*
message_cn: 内部错误：没有服务处理的消息
message_en: Internal Error: No service deals with message

regex: host is connecting, ping failed
message_cn: 物理机正在连接, 不能进行ping操作
message_en: host is connecting, cannot ping

regex: User name or password or port number may be problematic
message_cn: 用户名、密码或者端口可能是错误的
message_en: User name or password or port number may be problematic

regex: host[uuid:%s, name:%s] is in status[%s], cannot perform required operation
message_cn: 物理机[%2$s]正处于[%3$s]状态, 当前状态不允许进行该操作
message_en: Host[%2$s] is in status [%3$s], and unable to perform required operation

regex: unable to do the operation because the host is in status of Disconnected
message_cn: 物理机正处于己失联[Disconnected]状态, 物理机不能进行该操作
message_en: Host is in status [Disconnected] and unable to perform required operation

regex: unable to connect to KVM\[ip:.*, username:.*, sshPort:.*] to check the management node connectivity,please check if username/password is wrong;.*
message_cn: 无法连接物理机，可能由于物理机的ssh端口与管理节点不通, 或者ssh端口的用户名密码有误。
message_en: Unable to connect to KVM Host, please check the username and password, and make sure the host is reachable by management node.

regex:
shell command\[sudo PYTHONPATH.*zstacklib-[0-9.]*tar.gz.*failed
 ret code: 1
message_cn: pip安装失败。因为pip安装文件不完整，或者pip版本不正确
message_en: pip install failed, pip install file broken

regex: can not update host\[uuid:.*]which is connecting or creating, please wait.*
message_cn: 无法更新正在连接或添加中的物理机[uuid:%1$s]信息，请稍候
message_en: can not update host[uuid:%1$s]which is connecting or adding, please wait

regex: .*the host\[.*] ssh port\[.*] not open after [0-9]* seconds, connect timeout.*
message_cn: 物理机[%1$s]的ssh端口[%2$s]在 %3$s 秒内未开放，连接超时
message_en: the host[%1$s] ssh port[%2$s] not open after %3$s seconds, connect timeout

regex: .*failed to check cidr\[.*] for l2VxlanNetworkPool\[uuid:.*, name:.*] .*, can not find qualify interface .*
message_cn: 未能在kvm物理机上检查cidr[%1$s]上的l2VxlanNetworkPool[name:%3$s]，无法找到cidr[%1$s]的合格接口
message_en: failed to check cidr[%1$s] for l2VxlanNetworkPool[name:%3$s], can not find qualify interface for cidr[%1$s]

regex: .*can not update host\[uuid:.*]which is connecting or creating, please wait.*
message_cn: 无法更新正在连接或创建的物理机[uuid:%1$s]状态，请稍候
message_en: can not update host[uuid:%1$s]which is connecting or creating, please wait

regex: .*failed to start vm\[uuid:.* name:.*] on kvm host\[uuid:.*, ip:.*], because No enough physical memory for guest.*
message_cn: 在物理机上启动vm失败，因为物理机已经没有足够的物理内存可供虚拟机使用。
message_en: Failed to start vm on kvm host, because host do not have enough physical memory for vm.

regex: .*connection error for KVM host\[uuid:.*, ip:.*].*
message_cn: 物理机[uuid:%1$s，ip:%2$s]连接错误
message_en: Connection error for KVM host[uuid:%1$s, ip:%2$s]

regex: .*host \[uuid:.*] cannot be added to cluster \[uuid:.*] because qemu/libvirt version does not match.*
message_cn: 由于qemu/libvirt版本不匹配，无法将物理机添加至集群。
message_en: Host cannot be added to cluster because qemu/libvirt version does not match.

regex: there has been a kvm host having management ip\[.*]
message_cn: 己经存在的kvm host使用了ip[%1$s]
message_en: there has been a kvm host having management ip[%1$s]

regex: the KVM host\[.*] cannot access the management node's callback url. It seems that the KVM host cannot reach the management IP.*
message_cn: KVM主机[ip:%1$s]无法访问管理节点的回调地址。
message_en: The KVM host[ip:%1$s] cannot access the management callback url.

regex: .*the host' ssh port\[.*] not open after .* seconds, connect timeout.*
message_cn: 物理机ssh端口连接超时
message_en: the host' ssh port connect timeout

regex: .*No Host state is Enabled, Please check the availability of the host.*
message_cn: 没有处于可用状态的物理机
message_en: No Host state is Enabled

regex: .*failed to check physical network interfaces\[names :.*] on kvm host\[uuid:.*, ip:.*
message_cn: 未能在KVM主机[uuid:%2$s,ip:%3$s]上找到物理网络接口[names : %1$s]
message_en: No physical network interface [names:%1$s] was found on the KVM host [uuid:%2$s, ip:%3$s]

regex: .*field\[hostname] cannot be an empty string
message_cn: 物理机名称不能为空
message_en: hostname can not be an empty string

regex: unable to resume vm.*on kvm host.*failed to resume vm ,timeout.*
message_cn: 恢复云主机运行超时。
message_en: Resume vm timeout.

regex: failed to start vm\[.*] on kvm host.*KvmError: vm\[.*] is already running.*
message_cn: 无法启动云主机[名称：%2$s，uuid：%1$s]，因为它已在运行。
message_en: Failed to start vm[name:%2$s, uuid:%1$s], because it is already running.

regex: host\[.*] capacity is not enough to offer cpu\[[0-9]], memory\[[0-9] bytes]
message_cn: 物理机无法提供足够的资源[CPU：%1$s，内存：%2$s 字节]。
message_en: Host cannot provide enough resources[cpu:[%1$s, memory:[%2$s bytes]]].

regex: the local primary storage has no hosts with enough disk capacity.*required by the vm.*
message_cn: 没有物理机能为云主机[uuid：%2$s]提供所请求的磁盘空间[%1$s 字节]。
message_en: Cannot found host with enough disk capacity[%1$s bytes] required by the vm[uuid: %2$s]

regex: .*change kernel module kvm_intel status to present failed  error: modprobe: ERROR: could not insert 'kvm_intel': Operation not supported.*
message_cn: 物理机未加载kvm_intel(虚拟化)模块，无法执行当前操作
message_en: kvm_intel mod not be loaded, Operation not supported

regex: unable to connect to KVM\[ip:.*, username:.*, sshPort:.*] to check the management node connectivity,.*
message_cn: 无法登陆到KVM物理机[ip:%1$s, sshPort:%3$s]上检测物理机到管理节点的连通性
message_en: Cloudn't connetc to KVM[ip:%1$s, sshPort:%3$s] to check the connectivity of host to management node.

regex: The host\[uuid:.*]'s available memory capacity\[.*] is lower than the reserved capacity\[.*]
message_cn: 物理机[uuid:%1$s]的可用内存容量[%2$s]低于预留容量[%3$s]
message_en: The host[uuid:%1$s]'s available memory capacity[%2$s] is lower than the reserved capacity[%3$s]

regex: failed to create bridge\[.*] for l2Network\[uuid:.*, type:.*] on kvm host\[uuid:.*], because unable to create bridge\[.*] from device\[.*], because failed to execute shell command: brctl.*return code: 1.*stdout: .*stderr: device .* is already a member of a bridge; can't enslave it to bridge .*
message_cn: 设备己经属于另一个网桥
message_en: device is already a member of a bridge

regex: .*, because:.*SSH Error: ssh: connect to host .* port .*: No route to host.*
message_cn: 找不到访问物理机的路由
message_en: Can't find the route to host

regex: operation error, because:\[Errno 28] No space left on device
message_cn: 磁盘空间不足
message_en: No space left on device

regex: Unable to reconnect host
message_cn: 无法重连物理机
message_en: Unable to reconnect host

regex: This host is disconnected, cannot perform the required operation
message_cn: 物理机己失联，不能执行相应操作
message_en: This host is disconnected, cannot perform the required operation

regex: .*failed to start vm\[uuid:.* name:.*] on kvm host\[uuid:.*, ip:.*], because Traceback .*exceeds max disk limit.*
message_cn: 在物理机上启动vm失败，因为挂载的云盘数量超过上限。
message_en: Failed to start vm on kvm host, because exceeds max disk limit for vm.

regex: .*duplicate virtualID name.*
message_cn: 重复的虚拟ID名称
message_en: duplicate virtualID name

regex: the project[.*] is in state of .* which disallows the operation[.*]
message_cn: 项目的状态为[%3$s]，无法执行对应的操作
message_en: the project is in state of [%3$s] which disallows the operation

regex: .*image \[uuid:.*] has been deleted.*
message_cn: 镜像[uuid:%1$s]已经被删除
message_en: image [uuid:%1$s] has been deleted

regex: operation error, because:unknown image format: vmdk
message_cn: 未知镜像格式:vmdk
message_en: unknown image format: vmdk

regex: .*all backup storage that image\[uuid:.*] is on can not satisfy conditions\[status = Connected].*
message_cn: 镜像所在的备份服务器均未连接，请检查备份服务器状态
message_en: The backup storage where the image is located is not connected. Please check the status of the backup storage

regex: .*Partial download not supported for.*
message_cn: 从指定的链接下载失败
message_en: download from the url failed

regex: .*Target image not found, please check whether ImageStore directory is correctly mounted.*
message_cn: 没有发现目标镜像，请检查镜像仓库数据目录是否正确挂载
message_en: Target image not found, please check whether ImageStore directory is correctly mounted.

regex: .*login iscsi server .* on host .* failed, because can not discovery iscsi portal .*, cause iscsiadm: No portals found.*
message_cn: 登录iscsi服务器失败，因为无法发现iscsi端口。
message_en: Failed to login iscsi server, because cannot found iscsi portal[No portals found].

regex: .*iscsiadm: No matching sessions found.*
message_cn: 卸载时所用的ip与挂载target时的不一样，或target已经被移除。
message_en: The ip address is different with that when doing the attaching operation, or the target has already been removed.

regex: login iscsi server .* on host .* failed, because can not discovery iscsi portal .*:.*, cause iscsiadm: cannot make connection to .* Connection refused.*
message_cn: 登录iscsi服务器失败，因为连接被拒绝。
message_en: Failed to login iscsi server, due to connection refused.

regex: .*cannot allocate vni\[.*] in l2Network\[uuid:.*], out of vni range
message_cn: 不能在二层网络[uuid:%2$s]中创建vni[%1$s]，vni超出范围。
message_en: Cannot allocate vni[%1$s] in l2Network[uuid:%2$s], vni out of range.

regex: .*operation error, because:cannot find /sys/class/net/.*/operstate
message_cn: 目录/sys/class/net/下找不到物理网卡所对应的operstate文件。
message_en: Cannot find file:/sys/class/net/eth0/operstate

regex: There has been a L2VlanNetwork\[uuid:.*, name:.*] attached to cluster\[uuid:.*] that has physical interface\[.*], vlan\[.*]. Failed to attach L2VlanNetwork\[uuid:.*]
message_cn: L2VlanNetwork挂载失败，L2网络的物理接口[%4$s]已经被L2VlanNetwork网络[%2$s]挂载到集群上
message_en: L2VlanNetwork attached failed, the physical interface[%4$s] has already been attached to the cluster by L2VlanNetwork[%2$s]

regex: There has been a l2Network\[uuid:.*, name:.*] attached to cluster\[uuid:.*] that has physical interface\[.*]. Failed to attach l2Network\[uuid:.*]
message_cn: L2网络挂载失败, 物理网络接口设备[%4$s]已经被L2网络[%2$s]使用并挂载到集群上。
message_en: Failed to attach L2Network, the physical interface[%4$s] had been attached to the cluster by L2Network[%2$s].

regex: failed to check physical network interfaces\[names.*] on kvm host\[uuid:.*, ip:.*]
message_cn: L2网络挂载失败， 没有在kvm host上找到这个网络物理接口: [%1$s]
message_en: Failed to attach L2 Network, check physical network interfaces on kvm host[%1$s] failed.

regex: .*operation error, because:there are dupicated public \[ip:.*] on public network.*
message_cn: 该公网IP[%1$s]已经被占用。
message_en: This public ip [address: %1$s] has been occupied.

regex: there is already a vip\[.*] on l3Network\[uuid:.*]
message_cn: 在L3网络[uuid:%2$s]中，已经存在一个地址为[%1$s]的虚拟IP。
message_en: There has been a vip[%1$s] in the l3Network[uuid:%2$s].

regex: .*\[startIp .*, endIp .*, prefixLen .*, gateway .*] is not a valid ipv6 range.*
message_cn: [起始Ip %1$s, 结束Ip %2$s, 前缀长度 %3$s, 网关 %4$s] 不是一个有效的ipv6地址段
message_en: [startIp %1$s, endIp %2$s, prefixLen %3$s, gateway %4$s] is not a valid ipv6 range

regex: .*unable to attach a L3 network to the vm\[uuid:.*], Unable to create tap device vnic.*: Device or resource busy.*
message_cn: 无法将L3网络连接到vm, 因为无法创建tap设备:设备或资源忙。请重试一遍或者手动删除网络接口[%6$s]。
message_en: unable to attach a L3 network to the vm, Unable to create tap device: Device or resource busy.Please try again or delete device[%6$s] by yourself

regex: multiple CIDR on the same L3 network is not allowed. There has been a IP range.* is not in the CIDR with the existing one
message_cn: 同一L3网络上不能加载多个CIDR。
message_en: Multiple CIDR on the same L3 network is not allowed.

regex: the gateway\[.*] is not in the subnet .*
message_cn: 网关[%1$s]不在子网%2$s/%3$s中
message_en: the gateway[%1$s] is not in the subnet %2$s/%3$s

regex: IP address.* is not in CIDR.*
message_cn: IP地址[%1$s]不在CIDR中[%2$s]
message_en: IP address[%1$s] is not in CIDR[%2$s]

regex: .*IP allocator strategy\[RandomIpAllocatorStrategy] failed, because no ip is available in this l3Network.*
message_cn: 分配IP失败，三层网络[name:%1$s, uuid:%2$s]中已经没有可用的ip地址。
message_en: IP allocating failed, no available IP in L3network[name:%1$s, uuid:%2$s].

regex: .*overlap with ip range\[uuid:.*, start ip:.*, end ip: .*].*
message_cn: 与己有的网络段范围[uuid: %1$s, 开始: %2$s,结束: %3$s]重叠
message_en: overlap with exists ip range[uuid: %1$sstart ip:%2$s, end ip: %3$s]

regex: .*new add ip range gateway .* is different from old gateway.*
message_cn: 新添加网络段的网关%1$s和现有网络段的网关%2$s不一致。
message_en: The gateway %1$s of the newly added ip range is inconsistent with the gateway %2$s of the existing ip range.

regex: DHCP server ip \[.*] can not be equaled to gateway ip
message_cn: DHCP服务的IP不能与网关IP相同。
message_en: DHCP server can not use the same IP address with gateway.

regex: .*Cannot connect to LDAP server, communication false, please checkout IP, port and Base DN.*
message_cn: 无法连接LDAP服务器，请检查IP，端口和基准DN是否正确
message_en: Cannot connect to LDAP server, please checkout IP, port and Base DN

regex: .*Cannot connect to LDAP server, Invalid Credentials, please checkout User DN and password.*
message_cn: 无法连接LDAP服务器，无效的凭证，请检查用户DN和密码。
message_en: Cannot connect to LDAP server, Invalid Credentials, please check the User DN and the password.

regex: the license has been expired, please renew it
message_cn: 证书己过期
message_en: the license has been expired

regex: .*hijacked detected. Your license.* permits .* hosts, but consumed .*, request additional .*. You can either apply a new license or delete additional hosts.*
message_cn: 强制检测，您的许可证[%1$s]允许%2$s台主机，目前己用%3$s台。您可以申请新的许可证，也可以删除添加的主机
message_en: hijacked detected. Your license[%1$s] permits %2$s hosts, but consumed %3$s. You can either apply a new license or delete additional hosts

regex: .*you can only add .* hosts with the trail license; please apply for a commercial license if you want to add more hosts.*
message_cn: 您当前的许可证只允许添加%1$s台物理主机，如果您想要添加更多物理主机，请申请商业许可证。
message_en: you can only add %1$s hosts with the trail license; please apply for a commercial license if you want to add more hosts.

regex: you can only add [0-9]* hosts with current license; please upgrade the license if you want to add more hosts
message_cn: 您当前的许可证只允许添加%1$s台物理主机，如果您想要添加更多物理主机，请更新或申请商业许可证
message_en: you can only add %1$s hosts with the current license; please upgrade the license if you want to add more hosts

regex: Parse license error.*
message_cn: 解析许可证失败
message_en: Failed to parse license

regex: management node[uuid:%s] is unavailable
message_cn: 管理节点暂时不可访问
message_en: management node is unavailable

regex: Message[name: .*, id: .*] timeout after .* seconds
message_cn: 消息[名称:%1$s, id: %2$s]超时
message_en: Message[name:%1$s, id: %2$s] timeout

regex: failed to detach data volume[uuid:%s, installPath:%s] from vm[uuid:%s, name:%s] on kvm host[uuid:%s, ip:%s], because unable to detach the volume from the vm;it's still attached after 5 seconds
message_cn: 由于云主机操作系统限制可能会导致卸载云盘失败，请尝试对云主机关机后再次卸载
message_en: Detach volume may fail due to limitations of the VM operating system, please try again after VM shut down.

regex: .*the physical capacity usage of the host.* has exceeded the threshold.*
message_cn: 物理机[uuid:%1$s]的己用容量超过了阈值[%2$s]
message_en: the physical capacity usage of the host[uuid:%1$s] has exceeded the threshold[%2$s].

regex: required local primary storage.* cannot satisfy conditions.*, or hosts providing the primary storage don't satisfy conditions\[.*, size > .*]
message_cn: localstorage主存储的状态不是Enabled/Connected, 或者主存储内的物理机状态不满足条件：[状态为Enabled/Connected,存储容量 > %6$s字节]
message_en: local primary storage cannot satisfy conditions: status Enabled/Connected, or hosts providing the primary storage don't satisfy conditions: status Enabled/Connectd, size > %6$s bytes

regex: the required host.*, size > .* or doesn't belong to a local primary storage satisfying conditions.* or its cluster doesn't attach to any local primary storage
message_cn: 所需要的物理机属于以下情况: 1 状态不为Enabled/Connected,并且存储容量 > %4$s字节 2 所属于的localstorage状态不为enabled/Connected, 3 所属的cluster没有挂载到任何localstorage上
message_en: the required host belong to the bellow conditions: 1 status/state not Enabled/Connected, size > %4$s bytes 2 the localstorages which belong to are not Enabled/Connected, 3 the cluster does not attached to any localstorage

regex: no local primary storage in zone.* or contain hosts satisfying conditions.*
message_cn: 该zone内所有的localstorage都不满足以下条件: 1 状态为Enabled/Connected, 2 没有包含任何状态为Enabled/Connected,并且存储容量 > %6$s字节的物理机
message_en: no local primary storage in the zone is satisfing the bellow conditions: 1 status/state is Enabled/Connectd, 2 contains hosts which is Enabled/Connected and size > %6$s bytes

regex: no local primary storage can satisfy conditions.* or contain hosts satisfying conditions.*, size .*
message_cn: 所有的localstorage都不满足以下条件: 1 状态为Enabled/Connected, 2 没有包含任何状态为Enabled/Connected,并且存储容量 > %6$s字节的物理机
message_en: no local primary storage is satisfing the bellow conditions: 1 status/state is Enabled/Connectd, 2 contains hosts which is Enabled/Connected and size > %6$s bytes

regex: cannot find any qualified primary storage, errors are.*physical capacity usage has exceeded the threshold.*
message_cn: 找不到符合条件的主存储主存储,主存储的己用物理容量超过了所设阈值
message_en: cannot find any qualified primary storage, physical capacity usage has exceeded the threshold

regex: cannot find any qualified primary storage, errors are.*it has no space.*
message_cn: 找不到符合条件的主存储主存储,主存储的己经没有空间分配所需的容量
message_en: cannot find any qualified primary storage, it has no space

regex: [0-9]* is Integer overflow
message_cn: 找不到符合条件的主存储主存储,主存储的己经没有空间分配所需的容量
message_en: cannot find any qualified primary storage, it has no space

regex: .*unable to connect the shared block group primary storage\[uuid:.*, name:.*] to the cluster\[uuid:.*], Can't access shared block group primary storage on host\[uuid:.*].*
message_cn: 无法将主机上的共享块主存储加载到集群
message_en: unable to connect the shared block group primary storage to the cluster

regex: operation error, because:\[Errno 30] Read-only file system:.*
message_cn: 操作错误，因为主存储所在的文件系统是只读的。
message_en: Operation error, because the primary storage path is on a read-only file system.

regex: .*after subtracting reserved capacity\[.*], there is no primary storage having required size\[.* bytes].*
message_cn: 减去保留容量[%1$s]后，没有主存储有所需的容量大小[%2$s], 可能是主存储使用阈值设置较低
message_en: After subtracting reserved capacity\[%1$s], there is no primary storage having required size\[%2$s bytes], may be the threshold of primary storage physical capacity setting is lower

regex: .*the NFS primary storage\[uuid:.*, name:.*] has not attached to any clusters, or no hosts in the attached clusters are connected.*
message_cn: NFS主存储没有连接到任何集群，或者没有连接到所连接集群中的主机
message_en: the NFS primary storage has not attached to any clusters, or no hosts in the attached clusters are connected

regex: operation error, because:mount failed: mount -t nfs4 .*:.*
message_cn: 挂载nfs4失败
message_en: mount nfs4 failed

regex: .*url\[.*] has been occupied, it cannot be duplicate in same cluster.*
message_cn: url[%1$s]已被占用，不能在同一集群重复使用
message_en: .*url[%1$s] has been occupied, it cannot be duplicate in the same cluster.*

regex: .*operation error, because:\[Errno 2] No such file or directory: '.*rootVolumes.*'
message_cn: 找不到根盘的镜像文件。
message_en: Cannot find the image file of root volume.

regex: .*operation error, because:\[Errno 2] No such file or directory: '.*DataVolumes.*.qcow2'
message_cn: 找不到数据盘的镜像文件
message_en: can not find dataVolume's image file

regex: .*operation error, because:unable to mount the nfs primary storage\[url:.*] in .*
message_cn: 挂载NFS主存储超时。
message_en: Mount the nfs primary storage timed out.

regex: There is no LocalStorage primary storage.*when the cluster mounts multiple primary storage, the system uses the local primary storage.*
message_cn: 集群内没有正处于已启用且已连接状态的LocalStorage主存储，请检查集群内主存储的启用和就绪状态。
message_en: There is no LocalStorage primary storage with [state: Enabled, status: Connected] in the cluster, please check the state/status of the LocalStorage primary storage.

regex: .*can not find vg .* and create vg with forceWipw=.*
message_cn: 无法将主机上的共享块主存储加载到集群，因为存在原有数据，请勾选清理块设备并重试。
message_en: Unable to connect the shared block group primary storage to the cluster, because device is not empty, please check the checkbox of "Clear SharedBlock" and try again.

regex: .*after subtracting reserved capacity\[.*], primary storage\[.*] don't have required size\[.* bytes].*
message_cn: 减去保留容量 [%1$s] 后，主存储 [%2$s] 没有所需的容量大小 [%3$s bytes]，可能是主存储使用阈值设置较低。
message_en: primary storage [%1$s] don't have required size [%2$s] after subtracting reserved capacity. Possible reason: threshold of the primary storage usage is relatively low.

regex: .*quota exceeding.The resource owner\(or target resource owner\) account\[uuid:.*] exceeds a quota\[name:.*, value: .*]. Please contact the administrator.
message_cn: 配额超限。资源所有者(目标资源所有者)帐户[uuid:%1$s ] 超出配额[配额名称: %2$s, 配额总量: %3$s]，请联系管理员。
message_en: quota exceeding.The resource owner(or target resource owner) account[uuid:%1$s ] exceeds a quota[name: %2$s , value: %3$s]. Please contact the administrator.

regex: quota exceeding. The account\[uuid: .*] exceeds a quota\[name: .*, value: .*], Current used:.*, Request:.*. Please contact the administrator.
message_cn: 帐户[%1$s]的配额超出限制[配额名称: %2$s, 配额总量: %3$s], 当前已使用: %4$s, 本次请求数量: %5$s, 如需继续操作请联系管理员
message_en: The account[uuid:%1$s]'s quota exceeds the limit, name: %2$s, value:%3$s, current used: %4$s, request amount: %5$s. Please contact the administrator.

regex: .*quota exceeding.The resource owner\(or target resource owner\) account\[uuid:.*] exceeds a quota\[name:.*, value: .*], Current used:.*, Request:.*. Please contact the administrator.
message_cn: 请求资源超出配额。资源所有者或目标资源所有者帐户[uuid：%1$s]超出配额[配额名称：%2$s，配额总量：%3$s]，当前已使用：%4$s，本次请求数量：%5$s。如需继续操作请联系管理员。
message_en: Quota exceeded. The resource owner or target resource owner account[uuid:%1$s] exceeds a quota[name: %2$s, total amount: %3$s], current used: %4$s, request amount: %5$s. Please contact the administrator.

regex: quota exceeding. The account\[uuid: .*] exceeds a quota\[name: .*, value: .*]. Please contact the administrator.
message_cn: 帐户[%1$s]的配额超出限制[配额名称: %2$s, 配额总量: %3$s]
message_en: The account[uuid:%1$s]'s quota exceeds the limit, name: %2$s, value:%3$s.

regex: Cannot shrink .* volume\[uuid:.*]'s size
message_cn: 不能缩小卷[uuid:%2$s]的大小
message_en: Cannot shrink volume[uuid:%2$s]'s size

regex: .*Couldn't connect to host, port: .* The problem may be caused by an incorrect smtpServer or smtpPort.*
message_cn: 无法连接到主机, 这个问题可能是smtp服务或者smtp端口不正确导致的
message_en: Couldn't connect to host. The problem may be caused by an incorrect smtpServer or smtpPort

regex: \[.*] is not a standard cidr, do you mean \[.*]?
message_cn: [%1$s]不是一个标准CIDR,您是否想使用[%2$s]?
message_en: [%1$s] is not a standard cidr, do you mean [%2$s]?

regex: .*field\[mtu] must be in range of .*
message_cn: MTU的取值范围为[%2$s, %3$s]。
message_en: The field MTU must be in range of [%2$s, %3$s].

regex: .*failed to run virt-v2v command, log in conversion host: /tmp/v2v_log/.*
message_cn: 执行virt-v2v命令失败，登录宿主机查找日志:/tmp/v2v_log/
message_en: failed to run virt-v2v command, log in conversion host: /tmp/v2v_log/

regex: .*underlying host of conversion host\[uuid:.*] should be Connected.*
message_cn: v2v迁移时所使用的迁移物理机应处于己连接状态。
message_en: The state and the status of the conversion host should be Connected while v2v is working.

regex: .*refers to non-existing datastore.*This may be a bug in vCenter 5.5, please detach ISO in vSphere client and try again
message_cn: 文件名指向的datastore不存在，请通过vSphere客户端卸载掉iso再重试
message_en: filename refers to non-existing datatore. please detach ISO in vSphere client and try again

regex: .*field\[zoneUuid] of message\[org.zstack.vmware.APIAddVCenterMsg] is mandatory, can not be null.*
message_cn: 添加VCenter时，字段[zoneUuid]的值不能为空
message_en: field[zoneUuid] can not be null when APIAddVCenterMsg

regex: No clustered compute resource found
message_cn: 没有发现相应集群的计算资源。
message_en: No clustered compute resource found.

regex: VNC not enabled for vmUuid .* in ESX host .*
message_cn: 第一次接管过来的ESX物理机上的vm,由于没有配置vnc,无法打开控制台,需要重启或迁移vm后才能使用
message_en: VNC not enabled for vm in ESX host, you need reboot or migrate vm at least once

regex: failed to connect to vCenter:.*RetrieveServiceContent;.*java.net.NoRouteToHostException.*
message_cn: 无法连接到vCenter，请确保vCenter处于运行状态。
message_en: Failed to connect to vCenter, please ensure vCenter host is running.

regex: .*invoke method RetrieveServiceContent; .*java.net.SocketException.*
message_cn: 无法连接到vCenter，请确保vCenter处于运行状态。
message_en: Failed to connect to vCenter, please ensure vCenter host is running.

regex: Detected .*MAC address conflict.*
message_cn: 与当前已纳管的vCenter环境存在重复的MAC地址
message_en: duplicate MAC address with the currently managed vCenter environment

regex: There are tasks running on the VCenter\[uuid:.*], please try again later.
message_cn: 仍有任务在vCenter[uuid:%1$s]上运行，请稍后再试。
message_en: There are tasks running on the VCenter[uuid:%1$s], please try again later.

regex: Syncing with VCenter\[uuid:.*], please try again later.
message_cn: vCenter[uuid:%1$s]正在进行同步，请稍后再试。
message_en: Syncing with VCenter[uuid:%1$s], please try again later.

regex: .*the management network\[uuid:.*, gateway:.*] is not reachable.*
message_cn: 无法访问管理网络。
message_en: The management network is not reachable.

regex: Destination PrimaryStorageType is .* but the selected BackupStorageType for source Volume is .* which cannot be matched
message_cn: 克隆指定的主存储类型是 %1$s，但源主存储对应的备份存储类型是 %2$s,这两者不能匹配使用,请重新检查参数
message_en: Destination PrimaryStorageType is %1$s but the selected BackupStorageType for source Volume is %2$s, which cannot be matched

regex: The state of vm[uuid:%s] is %s. Only these state[Running,Stopped] is allowed to update cpu or memory.
message_cn: 云主机的状态为%2$s,只有状态[Running,Stopped]允许升级CPU/内存
message_en: vm status is %2$s now, only states[Running,Stopped] is allowed to update cpu or memory

regex: no Enabled hosts found in the \[[0-9]*] candidate hosts
message_cn: 找不到合适的host来启动vm, 因为满足分配条件的%1$s个hosts都不处于Enable状态
message_en: unable to allocate hosts, because the %1$s hosts which satisfied to allocate are not in Enable status

regex: no Connected hosts found in the \[[0-9]*] candidate hosts
message_cn: 找不到合适的host来启动vm, 因为满足分配条件的%1$s个hosts都不处于Connected状态
message_en: unable to allocate hosts, because the %1$s hosts which satisfied to allocate are not in Connected status

regex: no Connected hosts found in the \[[0-9]*] candidate hosts having the hypervisor type \[.*]
message_cn: 找不到合适的host来启动vm, 因为满足分配条件的%1$s个hosts都不是%2$s的虚拟化类型
message_en: unable to allocate hosts, because the %1$s hosts which satisfied to allocate are not %2$s hypervisor type

regex: no host having cpu\[[0-9]*], memory\[[0-9]* bytes] found
message_cn: 找不到合适的host来启动vm, 因为可以用于分配vm的host都没有足够的资源: cpu [%1$s], 内存 [%2$s]
message_en: unable to allocate hosts, because no hosts has enough resource: cpu [%1$s], memory [%2$s]

regex: the vm.*, but the host is either not having enough CPU/memory or in the state\[Enabled] or status\[Connected] to start the vm
message_cn: 找不到合适的host来启动vm, 因为该主存储的vm只能启动在host[%2$s]上，但这个host没有足够的cpu/memory资源，或不处于Enabled/Connected 状态
message_en: the vm can only be started on the host[%2$s] because of its primary storage, but the host is either not having enough cpu/memory, or in the Enabled/Connected status

regex: after filtering, .* returns zero candidate host, it means: .*
message_cn: 创建云主机在[%1$s]这个过滤器后找不到满足条件的host了，这意味着 [%2$s]
message_en: after filtering[%1$s] returns zero candidate host, it means: [%2$s]

regex: No host with .* found
message_cn: 以下条件导致分配时没有可满足的host: %1$s
message_en: No host with [%1$s] found

regex: unable to start the vm.*It doesn't have any nic, please attach a nic and try again
message_cn: 网卡删除后，无法启动主机
message_en: cannot start vm because it doesn't have any nic

regex: The vm's root volume is on the local storage.* however, the host on which the root volume is has been deleted
message_cn: 云主机的根盘在localstorage的主存储上,并且该根盘所在的host己经被删除
message_en: The vm's root volume is on the local storage. however, the host on which the root volume is has been deleted

regex: no host having state=Enabled status=Connected.*found
message_cn: 找不到状态为Enabled/Connected的host
message_en: no host having state=Enabled status=Connected found

regex: no host found in clusters that has attached to L2Networks which have L3Networks.*
message_cn: 这个L3网络所在的L2网络加载的所有集群中，都没有host
message_en: no host found in clusters that has attached to L2Networks which have L3Networks

regex: no host found in clusters which have attached to all primary storage .* volumes locate
message_cn: 与vm的volume所在的主存储所关联的所有集群中，都没有host
message_en: no host found in clusters which have attached to all primary storage which the vm's volumes locate

regex: .*requested vcpus is greater than max allowable vcpus for the live domain: .* make NUMA take effect.*
message_cn: 请求的vcpu超过允许最大vcpu的范围, 请检查你是否重新启动了虚拟机使NUMA生效
message_en: requested vcpus is greater than max allowable, please check if you have rebooted the VM to make NUMA take effect

regex: .*host\[uuid: .*] of local primary storage\[uuid: .*] doesn't have enough capacity\[current: .*bytes, needed: .*]
message_cn: 在物理机[uuid: %1$s]的本地主存储[%2$s]没有足够的容量[当前:%3$s字节，需要:%4$s]
message_en: host[uuid: %1$s] of local primary storage[%2$s] doesn't have enough capacity[current: %3$sbytes, needed: %4$s]

regex: .*unable to allocate hosts; due to pagination is enabled, there might be several allocation failures happened before; [\s\S]*no Connected hosts found in the \[[0-9]*] candidate hosts.*
message_cn: 找不到合适的host来启动vm。
message_en: Failed to allocate hosts.

regex: .*\[Errno 5] Input\/output error.*
message_cn: 操作失败，I/O错误。
message_en: I/O error.

regex: .*unable to allocate hosts; due to pagination is enabled, there might be several allocation failures happened before; [\s\S]*after filtering, HostAllocatorFilterExtensionPoint\[class org.zstack.vmware.VCenterHostAllocatorFilterExtensionPoint] returns zero candidate host.*
message_cn: 找不到合适的host来启动vm
message_en: unable to allocate hosts

regex: unable to start the vm\[uuid:.*]. It doesn't have any nic, please attach a nic and try again
message_cn: 无法启动虚拟机. 因为没有找到网卡, 请连接一个网卡, 然后重试
message_en: unable to start the vm. It doesn't have any nic, please attach a nic and try again

regex: unable to recover the vm.*. The vm's root volume is on the local storage.* however, the host on which the root volume is has been deleted
message_cn: 无法恢复云主机，因为虚拟机的根云盘处于物理机的本地存储上，但该物理机已经下线。
message_en: Unable to recover the vm. The vm's root volume is on a local storage; however, the host on which the root volume is has been deleted

regex: the vm\[uuid:.*] doesn't support to online attach volume\[.*] on the basis of that the image platform type of the vm is other.*
message_cn: 该虚拟机不支持在线添加云盘，因为这台虚拟机的基础镜像平台类型为“其他”。
message_en: the vm doesn't support to online attach volume on the basis of that the image platform type of the vm is "Other".

regex: unable to allocate hosts; .* HostAllocatorFilterExtensionPoint.*AffinityGroupFilterFlow] returns zero candidate host}]
message_cn: 创建云主机不能满足亲和组的条件
message_en: the affinity group condition cannot be met

regex: .*can't decrease cpu of vm.* when it is running.*
message_cn: 当云主机运行时，无法在线减少cpu数量
message_en: can't decrease cpu of vm when it is running

regex: Message\[name: .*StartNewCreatedApplianceVmMsg.* timeout after .* seconds.*
message_cn: 启动Vm超时
message_en: StartNewCreatedApplianceVmMsg timeout

regex: .*Expected unicast mac address, found multicast MAC address \[.*].*
message_cn: 请输入单播MAC地址，但输入为组播MAC地址[%1$s]
message_en: Please enter unicast MAC address, [%1$s] is multicast MAC address

regex: Duplicate mac address.*
message_cn: 重复的mac地址
message_en: Duplicate mac address

regex: .*no host having cpu\[.*], memory\[.*bytes] found.*
message_cn: 没有找到可以提供cpu[%1$s]，内存[%2$s字节]]的物理机
message_en: no host having cpu[%1$s], memory[%2$s bytes] found

regex: .*because:NIC device is still attached after.*
message_cn: 网络接口控制器设备仍然处于已挂载状态，请检查virtio驱动是否正常运行或关闭云主机后尝试重新卸载设备。
message_en: NIC device is still attached, Please check virtio driver or stop VM and detach again

regex: .*The vm\[.*] state is in shutdown for a long time, check whether the vm is normal.*
message_cn: vm[%1$s]长时间处于in shutdown状态，请检查vm是否正常。
message_en: The vm[%1$s] state is in shutdown for a long time, check whether the vm is normal

regex: .*current vm instance state\[.*] doesn't allow to proceed message[org.zstack.header.vm.APIStartVmInstanceMsg], allowed states are [Stopped, Created]
message_cn: 只有状态为已创建或者已停止的云主机允许被启动。
message_en: The Start action is only allowed to excuted on a vm instance whose state is Stopped or Created.

regex: .*user \[.*] not exist on vm\[.*]!
message_cn: 云主机用戶不存在
message_en: VM user not exist

regex: current vm instance state\[.*] doesn't allow to proceed message\[org.zstack.header.vm.APIStartVmInstanceMsg], allowed states are \[.*, .*]
message_cn: 云主机当前状态[%1$s]不支持该操作
message_en: Current vm instance state[%1$s] doesn't allow the operation

regex: .*, because:qemu-agent service is not ready in vm...
message_cn: 未安装qemu-agent，或相关进程没有成功启动
message_en: qemu-agent service is not ready or thr related process did not start successfully

regex: failed to create image from backup \[.*, .*]
message_cn: 创建镜像失败
message_en: Failed to create image

regex: failed to start vm\[uuid:.* name:.*] on kvm host\[uuid:.*, ip:.*], because Traceback .*libvirt error.*error reading header from.*Remote I/O error.*
message_cn: 启动云主机失败，因为读取云主机xml文件错误
message_en: Failed to start the VM, because failed to read VM xml file

regex: .*, because:Requested operation is not valid: transient domains do not have any persistent config
message_cn: 请求的操作无效：临时域没有任何持久性配置
message_en: Requested operation is not valid: transient domains do not have any persistent config

regex: .*, because:error: Failed to attach device from .*error: XML error: requested USB port .* not present on USB bus .*
message_cn: 加载USB设置的xml信息失败,USB设备的总线和端口发生了变化
message_en: Failed to load the xml information of the USB, the bus and port of the USB device changed.

regex: I/O error on POST request for .*http:.*getvncport.*:Connect to .* \[.*] failed: Connection refused.*
message_cn: 打开vncport时发生I/O错误
message_en: I/O error when opening vncport

regex: failed to start vm\[uuid:.* name:.*] on kvm host\[uuid:.*, ip:.*libvirt error: cannot read header '.*': Input/output error.*
message_cn: 启动云主机失败，因为读取云盘时发生了libvirt和I/O错误
message_en: Failed to start the VM because libvirt and I/O errors occurred while reading the cloud disk

regex: failed to start vm\[uuid:.* name:.*] on kvm host\[uuid:.*, ip:.* error reading header from .*: Operation not permitted.*
message_cn: 无法启动云主机，因为云盘对应的ceph文件读取失败
message_en: Failed to start VM because the ceph file corresponding to the volume failed to be read.

regex: the vm.*, but the host is either not having enough CPU/memory/GPU/VFNIC or in the state\[Enabled] or status\[Connected] to start the vm
message_cn: 找不到合适的host来启动vm, 因为该主存储的vm只能启动在host[%2$s]上，但这个host没有足够的cpu/memory/gpu/vfnic资源，或不处于Enabled/Connected 状态
message_en: the vm can only be started on the host[%2$s] because of its primary storage, but the host is either not having enough cpu/memory/gpu/vfnic, or in the Enabled/Connected status

regex: IP\[.*] is not available on the L3 network\[uuid:.*] because:.*it is gateway.*
message_cn: 在L3网络[uuid:%2$s]中，IP[%1$s]不可用, 因为IP是网关地址
message_en: IP[%1$s] is not available on the L3 network[uuid:%2$s] because: it is gateway

regex: IP\[.*] is not available on the L3 network\[uuid:.*] because:.*it is not in this range.*
message_cn: 在L3网络[uuid:%2$s]中，IP[%1$s]不可用, 因为IP不在网络段范围内
message_en: IP[%1$s] is not available on the L3 network[uuid:%2$s] because: it is not in this range

regex: IP\[.*] is not available on the L3 network\[uuid:.*] because:.*it is used.*
message_cn: 在L3网络[uuid:%2$s]中，IP[%1$s]不可用, 因为IP被占用
message_en: IP[%1$s] is not available on the L3 network[uuid:%2$s] because: it is used

regex: cannot attach the usb device.* to vm.*, possibly reasons include: the device is not enabled or had been attached to a vm, or the device and the vm are not on same host.
message_cn: 无法挂载USB设备到虚拟机，可能因为USB设备没有启用或已经挂载或者USB设备与虚拟机不在同一台物理机上。
message_en: Cannot attach the usb device to vm, possibly reasons include: the device is not enabled or had been attached to a vm, or the device and the vm are not on same host.

regex: the host that the usb device\[.*] pluged in is not in valid state\[.*] or status\[.*]
message_cn: 接入USB设备的物理机当前不是启用且已连接的状态。
message_en: The host which the usb device plugged in is not Enabled and Connected.

regex: data volume can only be attached when status is .*, current is .*
message_cn: 云盘只能在状态就绪或未初始化时加载，当前状态为%3$s
message_en: data volume can only be attached when status is Ready / NotInstantiated, current is %3$s

regex: .*current vm instance state\[.*] doesn't allow to proceed message\[org.zstack.header.vm.DetachDataVolumeFromVmMsg], allowed states are .*
message_cn: 当前vm状态[%1$s]不能卸载云盘。允许此状态是[%3$s]
message_en: current vm instance state\[%1$s] doesn't allow to detach DataVolume, allowed states are [%3$s]

regex: non admin account cannot set bandwidth more than.*
message_cn: 非admin帐号设置磁盘带宽超出限制 [%1$s]
message_en: non admin account cannot set bandwidth more than [%1$s]

regex: failed to create data volume template from volume.*on all backup storage.*. See cause for one of errors.*
message_cn: 无法在任何一个镜像服务器上成功创建数据磁盘[uuid：%1$s]的磁盘镜像。
message_en: Failed to create data volume template from volume [uuid:%1$s] on any backup storage.

regex: failed to attach data volume\[.*] on kvm host\[.*], because failed to execute shell command:.*: No such file or directory.*
message_cn: 将云盘[%1$s, %2$s]挂载到云主机[uuid:%3$s, name:%4$s]失败，因为云盘路径[%2$s]不存在
message_en: failed to attach data volume[uuid:%1$s, name:%2$s] on vm[uuid:%3$s, name:%4$s], because data volume path[%2$s] not found

regex: shareable volume\(s\)\[.*] attached, not support to group snapshot.
message_cn: 共享云盘[%1$s]已经被挂载，不支持快照组
message_en: shareable volume(s)[%1$s] attached, not support to group snapshot.

regex: .*the remoteCidr\[.*] is overlaped with VirtualRouter interface cidr\[.*].*
message_cn: 远端网络CIDR[%1$s]和云路由器接口CIDR[%2$s]重叠冲突
message_en: the remoteCIDR[%1$s] is overlaped with VirtualRouter interface cidr[%2$s]

regex: the peerAddress\[.*] cannot be the same to the VIP address
message_cn: 对端IP地址[%1$s] 不能与VIP 地址相同
message_en: the peerAddress[%1$s] cannot be the same to the VIP address

regex: .*Message\[name: org.zstack.appliancevm.StartNewCreatedApplianceVmMsg, id: .*] timeout after 1800 seconds.*
message_cn: 创建VPC路由器超时。请检查镜像，检查管理网双向互通，再试一次。
message_en: Creating VPC router timeout.Please check the mirror, check the two-way communication between the management network, and try again.

regex: the L3 network[uuid: .*] is same network address with [uuid: .*], it cannot be used for virtual router
message_cn: L3网络地址与另一个L3网络重复，无法被用于云路由
message_en: the L3 network address is same with another one, it cannot be used for virtual router
